title: PDF Image Extractor
subtitle: Extract images, diagrams, and graphics from your PDF documents
dragDrop: Drag & drop your PDF here or click to browse
fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 50MB.
invalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload a PDF document.
uploadFirst: Please upload a PDF file first
extractionError: Failed to extract images from PDF. Please try again.
originalDescription: Keep images in their original format from PDF
pngDescription: Convert to PNG with transparency support
jpgDescription: Convert to JPG for smaller file sizes
webpDescription: Convert to WebP for modern web use
mediumDescription: Good balance of quality and size
resultsDescription: All images and diagrams found in your PDF
zipDownloadMessage: In a real implementation, this would download a ZIP file containing all selected images
tip1Description: Use PDFs with high-resolution images for best extraction quality
tip2Description: Different PDFs may contain various image formats (JPEG, PNG, vector graphics)
tip3Description: Processing large PDFs with many images may take several minutes
tip4Description: Always review extracted images as some might be logos or decorative elements
